card_name: Cyamiede, Siren of the Seven Seas
rules_text:
[i]Lowtide[/i] – As long as you control three or less untapped Islands, Cyamiede, Siren of the Seven Seas can't be blocked. [i](As long as you control three or less untapped Islands, do X.)[/i]
Whenever Cyamiede deals combat damage to a player, exile target card from their graveyard and put a booty counter on it. Then until end of turn, you may play cards you exiled with booty counters on them.
